FuncDef: This command adds an SR OS application event number as a match criterion.
CLIs: number { eq | neq | lt | lte | gt | gte } <event-id>

ParaDef.Parameters: eq | neq | lt | lte | gt | gte
ParaDef.Info: This operator specifies the type of match. Valid operators are listed below.
Specifies the event ID, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo: Default: no event-number - No event ID match criterion is specified.
